abstracts.cdata!:
The Regulatory Reform and Capitalization
            Technical Assistance Project will provide support to: (i)
            strengthen the capacity of the Ministry of Capitalization to
            conduct the sector reform and capitalization process for six
            sectors (hydrocarbons, electricity, telecommunication,
            railway, aviation, smelter/mining); (ii) help establish the
            regulatory agency, Comision Nacional Reguladora (National
            Regulatory Commission); (iii) develop specific reform
            strategies, legislation and regulations for the
            reorganization of the telecommunications sector and the
            subsequent capitalization of Empresa Nacional de
            Telecomunicaciones (National Telecom Company); and (iv)
            develop a similar program for the aviation sector, which
            deals not only with the capitalization of Lloyd Aereo
            Boliviano (National Bolivian Airline), but also the
            divestiture of the airports authority Adminstracion Autonoma
            de Servicios Auxiliares a la Navegacion Aerea (Airports
            Administration Company), and the two smaller state-owned
            airlines Transportes Aereos Bolivianos and Transportes
            Aereos Militares.
